title: Enhancing Nursing Practical Competencies: Chronic Disease Management Model for Addressing Depression Treatment Gaps

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Within one week, learners can design strategies to address gaps in depression treatment using a chronic disease management model.
Learners can apply healthcare disparity reduction solutions with 80% accuracy in interactive simulations via mobile platforms.
Through formative assessments, learners can analyze the applicability of concepts in real healthcare settings across at least three contexts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
